text: The Iljik Junction(Korean: 일직 분기점; Iljik Bungijeom) is a road junction located in Gwangmyeong, Gyeoggi, Republic of Korea. Seohaean Expressway and Second Gyeongin Expressway intersect at this junction. == Roads == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- style="border-bottom:solid 0.25em blue;" ! colspan="5" | 20px Seohaean Expressway |- || toward Mokpo || rowspan="2" | ← || rowspan="2" | 36 Iljik Junction || rowspan="2" | → || toward Seoul |- || 35 Gwangmyeong Stn. IC 2.67km || 37 Soha JC 4.20km |- style="border-bottom:solid 0.25em blue;" ! colspan="5" | 20px 2nd Gyeongin Expressway |- || toward Incheon || rowspan="2" | ← || rowspan="2" | 13 Iljik Junction || rowspan="2" | → || toward Seongnam |- |- || 12 Gwangmyeong IC 4.37km || 14 Seoksu IC 1.02km |} == History == * December 28, 1995: Opens to Traffic Category:Seohaean Expressway Category:Second Gyeongin Expressway Category:Expressway junctions in South Korea Category:Gwangmyeong Category:Anyang, Gyeonggi
title: Iljik Junction
